name: Southwest Vegetable Melange
keywords: corn, green zucchini, jalapeño, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 medium zucchini, quartered and finely sliced
1/2 to 1 whole finely minced jalapeno, seeds removed
2 medium-ripe tomatoes or 4 plum tomatoes or 8 to 10 cherry tomatoes, cut in small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in skillet and saute onion until it is tender. Add zucchini and jalapeno and cook about 5 minutes over medium heat.
Stir in corn and tomatoes and cook an additional 5 minutes, until corn is heated through and tomatoes are soft.
